spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to grant you 4,579 Haste for 12 sec.

description: This strange critter has a rather unsettling habit of staring at you while you eat.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,207 Intellect. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 93,791 Nature damage over 8 sec.
Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
